Trade/Device Name(s): VITEK® 2 Gram Positive Amoxicillin for Streptococcus pneumoniae
VITEK 2 AST-GP Amoxicillin for Streptococcus pneumoniae
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITEK® 2 Gram Positive Amoxicillin antimicrobial susceptibility test for Streptococcus pneumoniae using automated microdilution methodology
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative antimicrobial susceptibility test for Streptococcus pneumoniae isolates using VITEK 2 and VITEK 2 Compact Systems to aid in determining in vitro susceptibility to amoxicillin.
